name: Astro Coin
description:
This is just an simple run and coin collect game. It has some enemies while will kill you if they touch your player. The player can jump on them and kill it. The game consist of 2 levels. It is a basic android game but it is interesting to play. Just download, install and play. Please contact and let me know if you can suggest any modification required. Your feedback will be valuable.
